thread.section_title: Technology - Internet Related Businesses For Sale in Canada
thread.title: National Online Textbook Service - Growing 400% / Year
thread.title_full: National Online Textbook Service - Growing 400% / Year

title: National Online Textbook Service - Growing 400% / Year
text: Questions Business Summary Exciting opportunity in the e-commerce space. Our company operates an online textbook service, renting and selling textbooks to students from across the country. Since our launch in 2010, we've grown to become the leading textbook rental company in Canada. High-level stats: Annual revenue run-rate (2013): $850k-$950k Alexa Rank (Canada): 8,700 Page Views (2013 YTD): 1MM Visitors (2013 YTD): 140k The total market opportunity in Canada is estimated at $750MM/year, with very little competition in the online segment. There is a significant opportunity to expand the current model into international markets (ie UK, Australia, Asia). Seller will be available for one year following sale to assist in transition of ownership, and offer training/support. Thank you for your interest. Financials
